167e17aa-1bdf-455c-9499-c1f65a7bf0de.content:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:04,000
The future is no longer on the horizon. It's here.

2
00:00:04,000 --> 00:00:07,200
Artificial intelligence is reshaping industries,

3
00:00:07,200 --> 00:00:10,800
revolutionizing how we live, work and innovate.

4
00:00:10,800 --> 00:00:15,439
From health care to finance, from smart cities to space exploration,

5
00:00:15,439 --> 00:00:18,640
AI is the driving force of our time.

6
00:00:18,640 --> 00:00:22,399
Right now, there's a global demand for AI engineers

7
00:00:22,399 --> 00:00:25,120
that far outpaces the supply.

8
00:00:25,120 --> 00:00:29,039
The world is investing in AI at an unprecedented rate,

9
00:00:29,039 --> 00:00:34,399
from Silicon Valley to Shanghai, from GCC to Europe.

10
00:00:34,399 --> 00:00:38,960
Every country, every industry is racing to build their AI capabilities,

11
00:00:38,960 --> 00:00:43,200
with salaries for AI engineers starting at $300,000,

12
00:00:43,200 --> 00:00:47,600
and climbing all the way to $750,000.

13
00:00:47,600 --> 00:00:51,679
There's a global talent war. One that you can be a part of.

14
00:00:51,679 --> 00:00:54,880
This revolution hinges on one key element.

15
00:00:54,880 --> 00:00:58,399
And as you've likely guessed, AI engineers,

16
00:00:58,399 --> 00:01:01,359
engineers who bridge imagination with execution,

17
00:01:01,359 --> 00:01:04,480
making the impossible inevitable.

18
00:01:04,480 --> 00:01:07,920
Today, 95% of companies are struggling,

19
00:01:07,920 --> 00:01:13,280
paralyzed by the scarcity of AI talent needed to define tomorrow.

20
00:01:13,280 --> 00:01:17,359
Companies like Elon Musk's XAI and Sam Altman's Open AI are

21
00:01:17,359 --> 00:01:22,480
eyeing for top talent. And now it's your time to join their ranks.

22
00:01:22,480 --> 00:01:26,319
Introducing to you Lunar Tech AI Engineering Bootcamp,

23
00:01:26,319 --> 00:01:29,680
a transformative program focused on Generative AI,

24
00:01:29,680 --> 00:01:34,640
designed to turn you into a world-class 10X AI engineer in just three to six months.

25
00:01:35,760 --> 00:01:40,719
This is your gateway to mastering the skills needed to thrive in the most competitive global markets.

26
00:01:41,760 --> 00:01:46,719
At Lunar Tech, we're not just teaching you skills. We prepare you to excel.

27
00:01:47,680 --> 00:01:53,680
Step by step, from mastering the technical foundations of AI and Generative AI models,

28
00:01:53,680 --> 00:01:58,879
to completing real world industry projects, you'll gain everything you need to become a world-class

29
00:01:58,879 --> 00:02:05,120
AI engineer equipped to create, innovate and deliver impactful solutions for industry challenges.

30
00:02:05,920 --> 00:02:12,159
This is not just another course. This is the most comprehensive and cutting-edge AI engineering bootcamp

31
00:02:12,159 --> 00:02:18,639
available. With a recognized certification, this program is meticulously crafted to ensure you

32
00:02:18,639 --> 00:02:26,479
emerge as an all-round AI engineer. We don't skim the surface. We dive deep into foundational

33
00:02:26,479 --> 00:02:33,520
models, the fundamentals of Generative AI, and not just LLMs, but the math and statistics that

34
00:02:33,520 --> 00:02:40,479
underpin the field. You'll master GANS, VAA's Transformers Language Models, Pre-Train and Fine

35
00:02:40,479 --> 00:02:46,479
Tuning, Rags, Optimization of each of these models, and even building your own language model

36
00:02:46,639 --> 00:02:53,599
from scratch on your own computer. The program goes beyond the technical, addressing AI ethics

37
00:02:53,599 --> 00:02:59,360
to help you create sustainable ethical models that align with the future of responsible AI.

38
00:03:00,240 --> 00:03:06,240
With a single goal in mind, we've designed this bootcamp to systematically produce AI engineers

39
00:03:06,240 --> 00:03:12,319
capable of bringing any vision to life, and it does just that. By the end of this bootcamp,

40
00:03:12,639 --> 00:03:18,159
you'll have more than just knowledge. You'll have an impressive portfolio for your resume

41
00:03:18,159 --> 00:03:24,240
filled with cutting-edge projects. The ability to bridge the gap between research and real-world

42
00:03:24,240 --> 00:03:31,039
applications and the confidence to secure high demand roles, or even launch your own AI driven ventures.

43
00:03:32,400 --> 00:03:38,159
This is your opportunity to gain the tools, mentorship, and expertise to lead innovation

44
00:03:38,719 --> 00:03:44,080
and shape the breakthroughs of tomorrow. The future of AI needs leaders.

45
00:03:44,960 --> 00:03:56,960
This is your moment to rise. Apply now.

00:03:06,240 --> 00:03:12,319
capable of bringing any vision to life, and it does just that. By the end of this bootcamp,

40
00:03:12,639 --> 00:03:18,159
you'll have more than just knowledge. You'll have an impressive portfolio for your resume

41
00:03:18,159 --> 00:03:24,240
filled with cutting-edge projects. The ability to bridge the gap between research and real-world

42
00:03:24,240 --> 00:03:31,039
applications and the confidence to secure high demand roles, or even launch your own AI driven ventures.

43
00:03:32,400 --> 00:03:38,159
This is your opportunity to gain the tools, mentorship, and expertise to lead innovation

44
00:03:38,719 --> 00:03:44,080
and shape the breakthroughs of tomorrow. The future of AI needs leaders.

45
00:03:44,960 --> 00:03:56,960
This is your moment to rise. Apply now.

7ff99931-04d8-4d05-b88d-0452c7d41262.content:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:03,220
El futuro ya no está en el horizonte. Está aquí.

2
00:00:04,339 --> 00:00:10,339
La inteligencia artificial está remodelando las industrias y revolucionando la forma en que vivimos, trabajamos e innovamos.

3
00:00:10,839 --> 00:00:18,039
Desde la atención sanitaria hasta las finanzas, desde las ciudades inteligentes hasta la exploración espacial, la IA es la fuerza impulsora de nuestro tiempo.

4
00:00:18,820 --> 00:00:24,199
En este momento, existe una demanda global de ingenieros de IA que supera con creces la oferta.

5
00:00:24,199 --> 00:00:31,920
El mundo está invirtiendo en IA a un ritmo sin precedentes, desde Silicon Valley hasta Shanghai, desde

6
00:00:31,920 --> 00:00:33,240
CCG a Europa.

7
00:00:34,320 --> 00:00:39,619
Cada país, cada industria está compitiendo para desarrollar sus capacidades de IA, con salarios.

8
00:00:39,619 --> 00:00:46,579
para ingenieros de IA desde $ 300 000 hasta $ 750 000.

9
00:00:47,799 --> 00:00:51,299
Hay una guerra global de talentos, una de la que tú puedes ser parte.

10
00:00:51,299 --> 00:00:57,719
Esta revolución depende de un elemento clave y, como probablemente habrás adivinado, los ingenieros de inteligencia artificial.

11
00:00:58,259 --> 00:01:03,020
Ingenieros que unen la imaginación con la ejecución, haciendo inevitable lo imposible.

12
00:01:04,000 --> 00:01:12,040
Hoy en día, el 95% de las empresas están pasando apuros, paralizadas por la escasez de talento en IA necesario para definir el mañana.

13
00:01:13,299 --> 00:01:18,560
Empresas como XAI de Elon Musk y Open AI de Sam Altman están buscando los mejores talentos.

14
00:01:18,560 --> 00:01:21,579
Y ahora es tu momento de unirte a sus filas.

15
00:01:22,500 --> 00:01:25,540
Le presentamos el Bootcamp de ingeniería de IA de LunarTech,

16
00:01:25,819 --> 00:01:29,219
un programa transformador centrado en la IA generativa,

17
00:01:29,780 --> 00:01:32,939
diseñado para convertirte en un ingeniero de IA 10X de clase mundial

18
00:01:32,939 --> 00:01:34,700
en sólo tres a seis meses.

19
00:01:35,359 --> 00:01:38,659
Esta es su puerta de entrada para dominar las habilidades necesarias para prosperar

20
00:01:38,659 --> 00:01:40,739
en los mercados globales más competitivos.

21
00:01:41,760 --> 00:01:44,480
En LunarTech, no solo le enseñamos habilidades.

22
00:01:45,120 --> 00:01:46,659
Te preparamos para sobresalir.

23
00:01:46,659 --> 00:01:53,280
Bueno, paso a paso, desde dominar los fundamentos técnicos de la IA y los modelos de IA generativa.

24
00:01:53,280 --> 00:01:58,099
Para completar proyectos industriales del mundo real, obtendrás todo lo que necesitas para convertirte en

25
00:01:58,099 --> 00:02:03,719
un ingeniero de inteligencia artificial de clase mundial, equipado para crear, innovar y ofrecer soluciones impactantes

26
00:02:03,719 --> 00:02:05,060
para los desafíos de la industria.

27
00:02:06,180 --> 00:02:07,480
Este no es un curso más.

28
00:02:08,240 --> 00:02:12,680
Este es el bootcamp de ingeniería de IA más completo y de vanguardia disponible.

29
00:02:12,680 --> 00:02:19,099
Con una certificación reconocida, este programa está meticulosamente diseñado para garantizar que usted emerja

30
00:02:19,719 --> 00:02:21,719
como ingeniero de IA integral.

31
00:02:22,960 --> 00:02:24,080
No rozamos la superficie.

32
00:02:24,800 --> 00:02:30,699
Nos sumergimos profundamente en los modelos fundamentales, los fundamentos de la IA generativa, y no solo

33
00:02:30,699 --> 00:02:34,520
LLM, sino las matemáticas y estadísticas que sustentan el campo.

34
00:02:34,520 --> 00:02:40,919
Dominarás GAN, VAE, transformadores, modelos de lenguaje, entrenamiento previo, ajuste fino,

35
00:02:41,520 --> 00:02:46,520
trapos, optimización de cada uno de estos modelos e incluso construir su propio modelo de lenguaje

36
00:02:46,520 --> 00:02:48,199
desde cero en tu propia computadora.

37
00:02:49,439 --> 00:02:55,240
El programa va más allá de lo técnico y aborda la ética de la IA para ayudarlo a crear sustentables.

38
00:02:55,240 --> 00:02:59,360
Modelos éticos que se alineen con el futuro de la IA responsable.

39
00:02:59,360 --> 00:03:08,300
Con un único objetivo en mente, hemos diseñado este campo de entrenamiento para formar sistemáticamente ingenieros de IA capaces de hacer realidad cualquier visión.

40
00:03:08,800 --> 00:03:10,199
Y hace precisamente eso.

41
00:03:10,699 --> 00:03:14,180
Al final de este campo de entrenamiento, tendrás más que solo conocimientos.

42
00:03:15,139 --> 00:03:19,960
Tendrás un portafolio impresionante para tu currículum lleno de proyectos de vanguardia.

43
00:03:20,419 --> 00:03:24,900
La capacidad de cerrar la brecha entre la investigación y las aplicaciones del mundo real.

44
00:03:24,900 --> 00:03:31,080
y la confianza para conseguir puestos de alta demanda o incluso lanzar sus propias empresas impulsadas por IA.

45
00:03:31,939 --> 00:03:37,939
Esta es su oportunidad de obtener las herramientas, la tutoría y la experiencia para liderar la innovación.

46
00:03:37,939 --> 00:03:40,439
y dar forma a los avances del mañana.

47
00:03:41,360 --> 00:03:43,919
El futuro de la IA necesita líderes.

48
00:03:44,620 --> 00:03:46,599
Este es tu momento de levantarte.

49
00:03:47,419 --> 00:03:48,180
Aplicar ahora.

50
00:03:59,319 --> 00:04:00,719
Tú

1ebb8bf6-2b4e-4879-802e-f0fa0e658dce.content:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:04,000
The future is no longer on the horizon. It's here.

2
00:00:04,000 --> 00:00:07,200
Artificial intelligence is reshaping industries,

3
00:00:07,200 --> 00:00:10,800
revolutionizing how we live, work and innovate.

4
00:00:10,800 --> 00:00:15,439
From health care to finance, from smart cities to space exploration,

5
00:00:15,439 --> 00:00:18,640
AI is the driving force of our time.

6
00:00:18,640 --> 00:00:22,399
Right now, there's a global demand for AI engineers

7
00:00:22,399 --> 00:00:25,120
that far outpaces the supply.

8
00:00:25,120 --> 00:00:29,039
The world is investing in AI at an unprecedented rate,

9
00:00:29,039 --> 00:00:34,399
from Silicon Valley to Shanghai, from GCC to Europe.

10
00:00:34,399 --> 00:00:38,960
Every country, every industry is racing to build their AI capabilities,

11
00:00:38,960 --> 00:00:43,200
with salaries for AI engineers starting at $300,000,

12
00:00:43,200 --> 00:00:47,600
and climbing all the way to $750,000.

13
00:00:47,600 --> 00:00:51,679
There's a global talent war. One that you can be a part of.

14
00:00:51,679 --> 00:00:54,880
This revolution hinges on one key element.

15
00:00:54,880 --> 00:00:58,399
And as you've likely guessed, AI engineers,

16
00:00:58,399 --> 00:01:01,359
engineers who bridge imagination with execution,

17
00:01:01,359 --> 00:01:04,480
making the impossible inevitable.

18
00:01:04,480 --> 00:01:07,920
Today, 95% of companies are struggling,

19
00:01:07,920 --> 00:01:13,280
paralyzed by the scarcity of AI talent needed to define tomorrow.

20
00:01:13,280 --> 00:01:17,359
Companies like Elon Musk's XAI and Sam Altman's Open AI are

21
00:01:17,359 --> 00:01:22,480
eyeing for top talent. And now it's your time to join their ranks.

22
00:01:22,480 --> 00:01:26,319
Introducing to you Lunar Tech AI Engineering Bootcamp,

23
00:01:26,319 --> 00:01:29,680
a transformative program focused on Generative AI,

24
00:01:29,680 --> 00:01:34,640
designed to turn you into a world-class 10X AI engineer in just three to six months.

25
00:01:35,760 --> 00:01:40,719
This is your gateway to mastering the skills needed to thrive in the most competitive global markets.

26
00:01:41,760 --> 00:01:46,719
At Lunar Tech, we're not just teaching you skills. We prepare you to excel.

27
00:01:47,680 --> 00:01:53,680
Step by step, from mastering the technical foundations of AI and Generative AI models,

28
00:01:53,680 --> 00:01:58,879
to completing real world industry projects, you'll gain everything you need to become a world-class

29
00:01:58,879 --> 00:02:05,120
AI engineer equipped to create, innovate and deliver impactful solutions for industry challenges.

30
00:02:05,920 --> 00:02:12,159
This is not just another course. This is the most comprehensive and cutting-edge AI engineering bootcamp

31
00:02:12,159 --> 00:02:18,639
available. With a recognized certification, this program is meticulously crafted to ensure you

32
00:02:18,639 --> 00:02:26,479
emerge as an all-round AI engineer. We don't skim the surface. We dive deep into foundational

33
00:02:26,479 --> 00:02:33,520
models, the fundamentals of Generative AI, and not just LLMs, but the math and statistics that

34
00:02:33,520 --> 00:02:40,479
underpin the field. You'll master GANS, VAA's Transformers Language Models, Pre-Train and Fine

35
00:02:40,479 --> 00:02:46,479
Tuning, Rags, Optimization of each of these models, and even building your own language model

36
00:02:46,639 --> 00:02:53,599
from scratch on your own computer. The program goes beyond the technical, addressing AI ethics

37
00:02:53,599 --> 00:02:59,360
to help you create sustainable ethical models that align with the future of responsible AI.

38
00:03:00,240 --> 00:03:06,240
With a single goal in mind, we've designed this bootcamp to systematically produce AI engineers

39
00:03:06,240 --> 00:03:12,319
capable of bringing any vision to life, and it does just that. By the end of this bootcamp,

40
00:03:12,639 --> 00:03:18,159
you'll have more than just knowledge. You'll have an impressive portfolio for your resume

41
00:03:18,159 --> 00:03:24,240
filled with cutting-edge projects. The ability to bridge the gap between research and real-world

42
00:03:24,240 --> 00:03:31,039
applications and the confidence to secure high demand roles, or even launch your own AI driven ventures.

43
00:03:32,400 --> 00:03:38,159
This is your opportunity to gain the tools, mentorship, and expertise to lead innovation

44
00:03:38,719 --> 00:03:44,080
and shape the breakthroughs of tomorrow. The future of AI needs leaders.

45
00:03:44,960 --> 00:03:56,960
This is your moment to rise. Apply now.
